long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a search new tab extension, which randomly shows three sentences from the New Concept English lessons below the search bar. The source of the sentence can be jumped to the corresponding article in the http://www.newconceptenglish.com website, which is convenient for grammar review. The search bar is only used for Baidu search, as well as some other features worth looking forward to. 
2024.1.19 - 新增生词提示功能  
2024.2.5 - 优化关键词展示
